name: Ruby of the War Mage
entries: Etched with eldritch runes, this 1-inch-diameter ruby allows you to use a {@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon} as a spellcasting focus for your spells. For this property to work, you must attach the ruby to the weapon by pressing the ruby against it for at least 10 minutes. Thereafter, the ruby can't be removed unless you detach it as an action or the weapon is destroyed. Not even an {@spell antimagic field} causes it to fall off. The ruby does fall off the weapon if your attunement to the ruby ends.
